name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Grants the ability to find hope in the darkest situations

name: The Godfather (Part I)
description: Allows the wearer to persuade any NPC once per game session

name: The Godfather (Part II)
description: Gives deep insight into complex situations and decisions

name: The Godfather (Part III)
description: Enhances leadership skills, increasing followers' loyalty

name: The Matrix
description: Unveils the hidden layers of reality, enhancing perception and reaction speed.

name: Nueve Reinas
description: Masters the art of deception, improving negotiation and bartering skills.
